1: הֵ֤ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עַבְדִּי֙ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>Behold my servant</n> אֶתְמָךְ־ <sup>8551 </sup> <n>whom I uphold</n> בּ֔וֹ בְּחִירִ֖י <sup>972 </sup> <n>mine elect</n> רָצְתָ֣ה <sup>7521 </sup> <n>delighteth</n> נַפְשִׁ֑י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[in whom] my soul</n> נָתַ֤תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I have put</n> רוּחִי֙ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>my spirit</n> עָלָ֔יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> לַגּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>to the Gentiles</n> יוֹצִֽיא׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>upon him he shall bring forth</n>
2: לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִצְעַ֖ק <sup>6817 </sup> <n>He shall not cry</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִשָּׂ֑א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>nor lift up</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יַשְׁמִ֥יעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>to be heard</n> בַּח֖וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>in the street</n> קוֹלֽוֹ׃ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>nor cause his voice</n>
3: קָנֶ֤ה <sup>7070 </sup> <n>reed</n> רָצוּץ֙ <sup>7533 </sup> <n>A bruised</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>He will not</n> יִשְׁבּ֔וֹר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>shall he not break</n> וּפִשְׁתָּ֥ה <sup>6594 </sup> <n>flax</n> כֵהָ֖ה <sup>3544 </sup> <n>and the smoking</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>He will not</n> יְכַבֶּ֑נָּה <sup>3518 </sup> <n>shall he not quench</n> לֶאֱמֶ֖ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>unto truth</n> יוֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>he shall bring forth</n> מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n>
4: לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִכְהֶה֙ <sup>3543 </sup> <n>He shall not fail</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> יָר֔וּץ <sup>7533 </sup> <n>nor be discouraged</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Until</n> יָשִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>till he have set</n> בָּאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> וּלְתוֹרָת֖וֹ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>for his law</n> אִיִּ֥ים <sup>339 </sup> <n>and the isles</n> יְיַחֵֽילוּ׃ <sup>3176 </sup> <n>shall wait</n> פ
5: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֞ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> הָאֵ֣ל ׀ <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בּוֹרֵ֤א <sup>1254 </sup> <n>he that created</n> הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> וְנ֣וֹטֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5186 </sup> <n>and stretched them out</n> רֹקַ֥ע <sup>7554 </sup> <n>he that spread forth</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וְצֶאֱצָאֶ֑יהָ <sup>6631 </sup> <n>and that which cometh out</n> נֹתֵ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>of it he that giveth</n> נְשָׁמָה֙ <sup>5397 </sup> <n>breath</n> לָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n> עָלֶ֔יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> וְר֖וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>upon it and spirit</n> לַהֹלְכִ֥ים <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to them that walk</n> בָּֽהּ׃

8: אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>that</n> שְׁמִ֑י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>that [is] my name</n> וּכְבוֹדִי֙ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>and my glory</n> לְאַחֵ֣ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>to another</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> אֶתֵּ֔ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>will I not give</n> וּתְהִלָּתִ֖י <sup>8416 </sup> <n>neither my praise</n> לַפְּסִילִֽים׃ <sup>6456 </sup> <n>to graven images</n>

22: וְהוּא֮ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>this</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>But this [is] a people</n> בָּז֣וּז <sup>962 </sup> <n>robbed</n> וְשָׁסוּי֒ <sup>8154 </sup> <n>and spoiled</n> הָפֵ֤חַ <sup>6351 </sup> <n>[they are] all of them snared</n> בַּֽחוּרִים֙ <sup>2352 </sup> <n>caves</n> כֻּלָּ֔ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> וּבְבָתֵּ֥י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>houses</n> כְלָאִ֖ים <sup>3608 </sup> <n>in prison</n> הָחְבָּ֑אוּ <sup>2244 </sup> <n>and they are hid</n> הָי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> לָבַז֙ <sup>957 </sup> <n>they are for a prey</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>none</n> מַצִּ֔יל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>and none delivereth</n> מְשִׁסָּ֖ה <sup>4933 </sup> <n>for a spoil</n> וְאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>none</n> אֹמֵ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and none saith</n> הָשַֽׁב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Restore</n>
23: מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> בָכֶ֖ם יַאֲזִ֣ין <sup>238 </sup> <n>Who among you will give ear</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> יַקְשִׁ֥ב <sup>7181 </sup> <n>to this? [who] will hearken</n> וְיִשְׁמַ֖ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and hear</n> לְאָחֽוֹר׃ <sup>268 </sup> <n>after</n>
24: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Who gave</n> [לִמְשֹׁוסֶה כ] (לִמְשִׁסָּ֧ה <sup>4882 </sup> <n>spoil</n> ק) יַעֲקֹ֛ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> לְבֹזְזִ֖ים <sup>962 </sup> <n>to the robbers</n> הֲל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> ז֚וּ <sup>2098 </sup> <n>he against whom</n> חָטָ֣אנוּ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>we have sinned</n> ל֔וֹ וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were not</n> אָב֤וּ <sup>14 </sup> <n>? for they would</n> בִדְרָכָיו֙ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in his ways</n> הָל֔וֹךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>not walk</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were they</n> שָׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>neither were they obedient</n> בְּתוֹרָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>unto his law</n>
25: וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>Therefore he hath poured</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> חֵמָ֣ה <sup>2534 </sup> <n>upon him the fury</n> אַפּ֔וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>of his anger</n> וֶעֱז֖וּז <sup>5807 </sup> <n>and the strength</n> מִלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of battle</n> וַתְּלַהֲטֵ֤הוּ <sup>3857 </sup> <n>and it hath set him on fire</n> מִסָּבִיב֙ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָדָ֔ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>yet he knew</n> וַתִּבְעַר־ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>not and it burned</n> בּ֖וֹ וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָשִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>him yet he laid</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>not</n> לֵֽב׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>[it] not to heart</n> פ
